rooms.description:
Welcome to Hogwarts! This is the Great Hall.
 There is an exit to the north.
You should drop the resurrection stone here.

This is Ravenclaw Tower.  There is an exit to the east.
You should drop the cloak of invisibility here.

This is Hufflepuff Basement.  There is an exit to the north.
You should drop the elder wand here.
This is Slytherin Dungeon.  There is an exit to the east.

This is Gryffindor Tower.  There is an exit to the north.
You should drop the golden snitch here.

This is the Chamber of Secrets.  DUN DUN DUN!!! There is no other exit except the entrance how you got here.
 You see Tom Marvolo Riddle and a Basalisk. You should take out (drop) the griffindor sword here.
 Your adventure ends here. Prepare to die.

items.description: The Resurrection Stone allows the holder to bring back deceased loved ones and communicate with the dead.
the Cloak of Invisibility has the power to shield the wearer from being seen by Death
The Elder Wand is an extremely powerful wand made of elder wood with a core of Thestral tail hair.
The GOlden Snitch a very fast and difficult-to-see golden orb the size of a walnut with wings.
